Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, north of the Iilandi University.
Room.LongDescription: The Iilandi University is one of the most prestigious schools in all the realms, mostly because it not only lets anyone who has a desire to learn enroll, but also because the professors must have a genuine desire to teach and do research. The various scientific stations around the University provide an infinite amount of researchable activity that could keep the great minds of the time busy for generations to come.
